references: L. J. Mordell, A new Waring's problem with squares of linear forms, Quart. J. Math., 1 (1930), 276-288 (see p. 283).
mathematica: f[upto_]:=Module[{maxi=Floor[(Log[2,upto]-1)/2],maxj= Floor[(upto-3)/8],s},s=2^(2First[#]+1) (8Last[#]+3)&/@ Tuples[{Range[0,maxi], Range[0,maxj]}];Union[Select[s,#<=upto&]]]; f[700]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 23 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 01 2000
